mapper.sql: id AS "id", task_number AS "taskNumber", use_request_id AS "useRequestId", process_number AS "processNumber", s_material_type_id AS "sMaterialTypeId", s_material_id AS "sMaterialId", s_number AS "sNumber", use_material_type_id AS "useMaterialTypeId", use_material_id AS "useMaterialId", use_number AS "useNumber", stock_id AS "stockId", loca_number AS "locaNumber", operator AS "operator", operation_time AS "operationTime", task_state AS "taskState", interface_state AS "interfaceState", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_cabinet2_use_task where 1 = 1
and task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')

select
from wms_cabinet2_use_task where 1 = 1
and task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')

select wt.*,wm.material_type as materialType,wm.material_sku as materialSku,wm.material_name,wm.sizes from wms_cabinet2_use_task wt left join wms_material_type wm on wt.use_material_type_id = wm.id where 1 = 1 and wt.operator = #{paramCondition.operator} and wt.task_state = "0"

select
from wms_cabinet2_use_task where 1 = 1
and task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')
mapper.update: update wms_cabinet2_use_task set task_state = #{state} where id = #{id}
update wms_cabinet2_use_task set s_number = #{scrapNumber} where id = #{taskId}
